attributes.action: For members of parliament fined due to 'Partygate', C-19 rule breaking to resign
attributes.additional_details: Those who've enforced the C-19 rules and restrictions and then been found to break said rules must be held to account. They must be removed if they're unable to do the right and honorable thing in resigning.
attributes.background: For members of parliament fined due to 'Partygate', C-19 rule breaking to resign

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked or resign.
